rows: Handles the description of theModellayer’s data sources.
Handles the generation of theViewModellayer. The layer contains the business logic for interaction of theViewandModellayers.
Functions that check whether theViewModelattribute value is correct.
Functions that modify the value of theViewModelattribute bound to a property of the visual component.
Items of theHandlerChainmechanism that enables you to describe business logic as an action request and a chain of handlers.
html:
Section

Description

modelConfigDiff

Handles the description of the Model layer’s data sources.

viewConfigDiff

Handles the generation of the View layer.

viewModelConfigDiff

Handles the generation of the ViewModel layer. The layer contains the business logic for interaction of the View and Model layers.

validators

Functions that check whether the ViewModel attribute value is correct.

converters

Functions that modify the value of the ViewModel attribute bound to a property of the visual component.

handlers

Items of the HandlerChain mechanism that enables you to describe business logic as an action request and a chain of handlers.
